Package ulb.infof307.g02.model.sql_super_class

Class SQLBuilder<T extends SQLBuilder<T,R>,R extends SQLModel<?>>

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g02.model.sql_super_class.SQLBuilder<T,R>
Type Parameters:
T - is the Type of the builder himself, allow SQLBuilder to return itself
R - is the Type of the object that the builder need to build
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ingredient.Builder, IngredientRecipe.Builder, IngredientShoppingList.Builder, IngredientStore.Builder, Recipe.Builder, RecipeSchedule.Builder, ShoppingList.Builder, Store.Builder, User.Builder
public abstract class SQLBuilder<T extends SQLBuilder<T,R>,R extends SQLModel<?>> extends Object
The builder class is used to generalize all SQLModel builders and force them to define the two methods makeObjectFromResultSet() and makeObjectFromBuilder()

      protected abstract R makeObjectFromResultSet() throws SQLException

      Returns:
      the model that the builder is required to build
      Throws:
      SQLException - if the retrieve of information via the ResultSet failed
